verses.name: Mark 6:14
verses.text: And king Herod heard of him; (for his name was spread abroad:) and he said, That John the Baptist was risen from the dead, and therefore mighty works do shew forth themselves in him.

verses.name: Mark 6:15
verses.text: Others said, That it is Elias. And others said, That it is a prophet, or as one of the prophets.

verses.name: Mark 6:16
verses.text: But when Herod heard thereof, he said, It is John, whom I beheaded: he is risen from the dead.
